title: By the Icy Wild
description: The threat is far from over. I will live by the icy wild.Ava Holland is dead. At least, that’s what everyone’s supposed to believe. But Ava is on her way to the northern wilds and hidden within the icy mountains are dangers that nobody dares speak aloud. Meanwhile, Michael is forced to accept Ava’s death while defending his new home against the growing darkness beyond. When a mortality war begins, will anyone survive?By the Icy Wild is the third book in an action-packed four-book series.Note: This is a previously-published edition of ASIN B01N5D6BYB.
author: Everly Frost
